1.name: Logistics Repair
1.description: Every 35s: heals all friendlies for 1.0% (3.0%) of Akashi's max HP.

2.name: Reload Command: Vanguard
2.description: Increases the RLD of all friendlies in the Vanguard Fleet by 5.0% (15.0%). Does not stack with the same skill.

3.name: Regular Maintenance
3.description: When sortieing with this ship: receive 1 (3) Emergency Repair. You cannot level this skill.

1.name: Akashi
1.description: Repair ship Akashi. Can be built after unlocking</color>

2.name: Akashi's in the Red, Nya!
2.description: Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!

3.name: Black Cat Strikes！
3.description: Fufufu, I was saving up just for this moment... Nyanya♪ A special dress that combines elements from both the Sakura Empire and the Occident nya! Commander, how are your gems today nya?

limitBreak.tier1: Strategy: Emergency Repair chances +1/AA gun efficiency +3%
limitBreak.tier2: Team ammo +1/AA gun base +1/AA gun efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier3: Strategy: Emergency Repair chances +1/AA gun efficiency +7%

1.chinese: 明石号维修舰・获得后将解锁建造
1.chineseTL: Repair ship Akashi - Can be built after unlocking
1.english: Repair ship Akashi - Can be built after unlocking

2.chinese: 喵！唯一的修理舰就是明石了喵！在楚克基地被毁灭前一直是由明石支援前线，受伤了的话尽管交给明石就对喵！
2.chineseTL: Nya~! The one and only repair ship Akashi nya~! Before the Truk Lagoon naval base was destroyed Akashi was the support for frontlines, if you get injured just leave it to Akashi nya~!
2.japanese: にゃ！たった一隻の工作艦の明石にゃ！トラック基地壊滅前はこの明石がずっと前線を支えていたにゃ。怪我したらこの明石に任せて間違いなしにゃ！
2.japaneseTL: Nya~! The one and only repair ship Akashi nya~! Before the Truk Lagoon naval base was destroyed it was Akashi who was always supporting the frontlines nya~ If you get injured just leave it to Akashi nya~!
2.english: Nya! I am the one and only repair ship, Akashi. I supported the front lines until the destruction of the Truk naval base. If you get all scratched up, just leave it to me nya!

3.chinese: 我是联合舰队唯一的工作舰，明石喵。哪里受伤了，只要交给我就没问题喵。但即使如此，也不要太过轻视自己的性命……喵
3.chineseTL: I am the one and only repair ship of the Combined Fleet, Akashi nya~! If you get injured anywhere, just leave it to me and it will be no problem nya~ But even so, you still shouldn't take your life too lightly... nya~
3.japanese: 私は連合艦隊唯一の工作艦だにゃ。けがをしたなら、私に任せてほしいにゃ。でも、自分の命は大事にしないといけない･･･にゃ
3.japaneseTL: I am the one and only repair ship of the Combined Fleet nya~ If you get injured, just leave it to me nya~ However, you must still take good care of your life... nya~
3.english: I am the only repair ship in the entire Sakura Empire, Akashi nya~! There is no injury that I cannot fix. Having that said, you should not take your life too lightly.

4.japanese: 指揮官こんにゃちは～ふあぁ

5.chinese: 指挥官，要不要让我帮你做下身体检查？
5.chineseTL: Commander, do you need me to do a body checkup for you?
5.japanese: 指揮官、身体検査をしてあげようかにゃ？
5.japaneseTL: Commander, want me to do a body checkup for you nya~?

7.chinese: 指挥官怎么了…难道是坏掉了？需要我修修喵？
7.chineseTL: Commander, what's the matter... Did you break? Need me to repair you nya~?
7.japanese: 指揮官どうしたにゃ･･･まさか壊れちゃった？修理するかにゃ？
7.japaneseTL: Commander, what's the matter nya... Did you break? Need me to repair you nya~?
7.english: Commander, what’s the matter? Can it be that you broke?

8.chinese: 指挥官要来点饮料喵？我刚从别的船身上榨出来的喵
8.chineseTL: Commander, up for a drink? I just squeezed it from another ship nya~
8.japanese: 指揮官は飲み物いるかにゃ？さっき、他の船体からしぼってきたにゃ
8.japaneseTL: Is Commander up for a drink nya~? Just now, I squeezed it from another ship nya~
8.english: Commander, care for a beverage? Freshly squeezed from another ship nya~!

9.japanese: 明石はどこも悪くないにゃ？

10.chinese: 嗯……？这种感觉是？好像需要修理一下……
10.chineseTL: Hmm...? This feeling is? Seems like repairs are needed...
10.japanese: ん･･･？これは？修理が必要そうだにゃ･･･
10.japaneseTL: Hmm...? This is? Repairs are needed nya...
10.english: Nn? What's this feeling? It's as if I've been damaged.

12.chinese: 指挥官指挥官，新的任务发布了哦
12.chineseTL: Commander Commander, the new mission has been released
12.japanese: 指揮官、指揮官、新しい任務が出たにゃ
12.japaneseTL: Commander Commander, the new mission has been released nya~
12.english: Commander, Commander~! You've got a new mission!

13.chinese: 任务奖励到了，会有好吃的吗……
13.chineseTL: The mission rewards arrived, will there be anything tasty...
13.japanese: ボーナスに、美味しいおやつがあるのかにゃ……？
13.japaneseTL: Are there any tasty snacks in the bonus rewards nya...?
13.english: Rewards are here~! Anything tasty... nya...?

14.japanese: じーーメールが届いた、にゃ

15.chinese: 指挥官哪里坏了的话，明石可以帮你修……
15.chineseTL: If Commander is broken anywhere, Akashi can help fix you up...
15.japanese: 指揮官が壊れたら直してあげるにゃ…
15.japaneseTL: If Commander is broken I can fix you up nya...
15.english: If you are broken anywhere, Akashi can fix you up.

16.chinese: 委托组的姐妹们回来了喵，明石去看看她们有没有受伤喵！
16.chineseTL: The sisters from the commission fleet have returned, Akashi is going to check if they got injured nya~!
16.japanese: 委託の子たちが帰ったにゃ。怪我してないかちょっと見てくるにゃ
16.japaneseTL: The girls from the commission fleet have returned nya~ I'm going to check if they got injured nya
16.english: The girls from the commission fleet have returned~ Akashi will check to see if they're injured, nya~!

17.chinese: 喵？！身体暖暖的，好舒服喵……
17.chineseTL: Nya?! Body feels warm, very comfortable nya...
17.japanese: にゃ！？暖かくて気持ちいいにゃ……
17.japaneseTL: Nya?! It's a warm and nice feeling nya...
17.english: Nya?! What a nice and warm feeling...

18.chinese: 毫不客气的上吧喵~坏了保修
18.chineseTL: No need to hesitate nya~ I'll repair you if you break
18.japanese: 遠慮しないでかかれにゃ～壊れたら修理してあげるにゃ
18.japaneseTL: Go on without hesitation nya~ I'll repair you if you break nya~
18.english: Charge forward without hesitation! I’ll fix you if you break.

19.chinese: 散落的零件里有不少好东西，真不错喵
19.chineseTL: There's good stuff in the scattered parts, not bad nya~
19.japanese: 入手した戦利品でいい部品がたくさんあるよ~よかったにゃ！
19.japaneseTL: There are many good parts in the loot we got~ Nice nya~!
19.english: There’s always some nice stuff among the litter.

20.chinese: 呜喵，等我下次好好修理你们！
20.chineseTL: Uunya, next time I'll make sure to repair you!
20.japanese: うにゃ、次は覚えてろにゃ！
20.japaneseTL: Uunya, I'll remember this for next time nya!
20.english: Nyooo~! Just wait until next time!

21.chineseTL: Nya?! Akashi came to the rescue nya!
21.japanese: にゃ！？明石にまかせろにゃ！
21.japaneseTL: Nya?! Leave it to Akashi nya!
21.english: Nya~?! Akashi is here to rescue you, nya~!

22.chineseTL: Akashi needs to work harder nya!

23.chinese: 喵？！（受惊的明石迅速躲远，躲在墙后观察着你）
23.chineseTL: Nya?! (Frightened Akashi escapes quickly and hides behind the wall to observe you)
23.english: Nya?! (Akashi, completely frightened, escapes and observes you from behind a wall)

24.chinese: 指挥官也要明石修理喵？
24.chineseTL: Commander also needs Akashi's repairs nya?
24.japanese: 指揮官も明石の修理が必要かにゃ？
24.japaneseTL: Commander also needs Akashi's repairs nya?
24.english: Commander... do you need Akashi to repair you, nya?

25.chinese: 指挥官，明石困了……（明石毫不理会你的反应直接蜷缩在你的腿上睡了起来）
25.chineseTL: Commander, Akashi is sleepy... (Akashi ignores your reaction and curls up on your lap to sleep)
25.english: Commander... Akashi is sleepy... (Akashi ignores your reaction, curls up on your lap, and falls asleep)

26.chinese: 指挥官指挥官，快把衣服脱了喵，明石要研究一下指挥官的身体，以后指挥官身上出问题也可以修了喵
26.chineseTL: Commander Commander, hurry up and take off your clothes nya~ Akashi needs to study Commander's body, so I can do repairs next time there's something wrong with Commander nya
26.japanese: 指揮官指揮官、早く服を脱いでにゃ。明石がもしもの時に備えて、指揮官の体を研究しておくにゃ
26.japaneseTL: Commander Commander, hurry up and take off your clothes nya~ Akashi wants to study Commander's body in case it's needed in the future nya
26.english: Hey Commander, hurry up and take off your clothes and let Akashi inspect your body in case you need repairs in the future, nya~!

27.chinese: 指挥官对明石这么好，难道明石是指挥官的上帝喵！
27.chineseTL: Commander is so nice to Akashi, perhaps Akashi is Commander's goddess nya!
27.japanese: 指揮官は明石のにこんなによくしてくれて、もしかしたら明石、指揮官の神様なのかにゃ！？
27.japaneseTL: Commander is so nice to Akashi, perhaps Akashi is Commander's goddess nya!?
27.english: You treat Akashi so well... Is Akashi your goddess, nya~?

28.chinese: 指挥官，这是什么，要明石来修理一下喵？——虽然不太明白，是很重要的东西的话明石就帮指挥官保管好了喵！
28.japanese: 指揮官、これはなんにゃ？明石の修理が必要かにゃ？……よくわからないけど、大切なものなら指揮官の代わりに大事に預かっておくにゃ！
28.english: What's this, Commander?  Does it need fixing? I don't really get it but, I'll keep it safe, nya~!

29.chinese: @明石特制·情人节巧克力喵！免费杀必死喵！感谢指挥官一直以来对明石和小店的支持喵，以后也要常来找明石玩喵！
29.chineseTL: @Akashi Specially-crafted - Valentine's Chocolate nya! Completely free service nya! I'm grateful for Commander's support for Akashi's small store, please come more often to play with Akashi nya!
29.japanese: 明石特製のバレンタインチョコだにゃ！無料サービスにゃ！いつも明石のお店を応援してくれてありがとにゃ！これからも明石のところに遊びにきてにゃ♪
29.japaneseTL: Akashi Specially-crafted Valentine's Chocolate nya! Completely free service nya! Thanks for always supporting Akashi's store nya! Come more often to Akashi's place to play nya♪

30.chinese: 感谢一直以来对明石商店的惠顾！今年明石的情人节巧克力是“吓你一跳啾啾巧克力”喵！一共好像有280种哦喵！推荐大家一起收集喵！……明年可能会推出第二弹喵！
30.chineseTL: Thanks for the continuous patronage to Akashi's store! This year Akashi's Valentine's choclate is "Surprising Mantou Chocolate" nya! I think there are 280 types nya! I recommend everyone to collect them nya!... Next year I might launch the sequel nya!
30.japanese: いつも明石のお店を贔屓にしてくれてありがとにゃ！今年の明石からのバレンタインチョコは「びっくり饅頭チョコ」だにゃ！全部で280種類くらいあるみたいだにゃ！みんなで集めるのをオススメするにゃ！…来年は第二弾が出るかもにゃ！
30.japaneseTL: Thanks for the continuous patronage to Akashi's store! This year Akashi's Valentine's choclate is "Surprising Mantou Chocolate" nya! I think there are 280 types nya! I recommend everyone to collect them nya!... Next year I might launch the sequel nya!

1.chinese: 指挥官，明石的新衣服怎样喵？是不是很可爱喵！觉得可爱的话就买一点装备吧喵，大家都去玩了…卖不掉要破产了喵……
1.chineseTL: Commander, how are Akashi's new clothes nya? Aren't they cute nya! If you think they're cute then buy some equipment nya~ Everyone went out to play already... If I can't sell these I'll go bankrupt nya...
1.japanese: 指揮官、明石の新しい衣装はどうかにゃ？可愛いかにゃ？可愛く思ったらこの装備を買ってにゃ！…売れなくて不良在庫になってるにゃ……
1.japaneseTL: Commander, how are Akashi's new clothes nya? Are they cute nya? If you think they're cute then buy these equipment nya!... If I can't sell they'll become dead stock nya...
1.english: Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!

2.chinese: 指挥官，明石的新衣服怎样喵？是不是很可爱喵！觉得可爱的话就买一点装备吧喵，大家都去玩了…卖不掉要破产了喵……
2.chineseTL: Commander, how are Akashi's new clothes nya? Aren't they cute nya! If you think they're cute then buy some equipment nya~ Everyone went out to play already... If I can't sell these I'll go bankrupt nya...
2.japanese: 指揮官、明石の新しい衣装はどうかにゃ？可愛いかにゃ？可愛く思ったらこの装備を買ってにゃ！…売れなくて不良在庫になってるにゃ……
2.japaneseTL: Commander, how are Akashi's new clothes nya? Are they cute nya? If you think they're cute then buy these equipment nya!... If I can't sell they'll become dead stock nya...
2.english: Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!

3.chinese: 今天也要努力地把装备卖出去喵！
3.chineseTL: I have to work hard today as well to sell equipment nya!
3.japanese: 今日も完売目指して頑張るにゃ！
3.japaneseTL: I will work hard today as well to sell out all stock nya!
3.english: I have to work hard today as well to sell as much equipment as I can, nya!

4.chineseTL: Commander wants to buy something nya?!
4.japanese: 指揮官が買ってくれるかにゃ！？
4.japaneseTL: Commander came to buy something nya!?
4.english: Commander, you've come to buy something, nya?!

5.chinese: 呜呜，装备滞销了喵，指挥官，买一点喵，就一点……
5.chineseTL: Uuu, the equipment became unsalable... Commander, buy something, just a bit...
5.japanese: うぅ…不良在庫だにゃ…指揮官、買ってにゃ…ちょっとでも買ってにゃ……
5.japaneseTL: Uuu... it became dead stock nya... Commander, buy something nya... even just a little nya...
5.english: Uugh... the equipment isn't selling... Commander, buy it all, nya... just buy a little bit, nya...

6.chinese: 新年快乐喵！不如来店里买点东西喵？
6.chineseTL: Happy new year nya! How about coming to my store to buy something nya?
6.japanese: あけましておめでとうにゃ！明石のお店でなんか買ってにゃ？
6.japaneseTL: Happy new year nya! Want to buy something from Akashi's store nya?
6.english: Happy New Year! Want to buy something from Akashi's store?

7.chinese: 唔……指挥喵，不要动，我还要睡喵……
7.chineseTL: Hmm... Commander, don't move, I'm still sleeping nya...
7.japanese: ふにゃ……指揮官動かないでにゃ…まだ寝てるにゃ……
7.japaneseTL: Funya... Commander stop moving nya... I'm still sleeping nya...
7.english: *yawns* ... Commander, stop moving around so much... I'm still sleepy, nya...

8.chineseTL: Nya?! Akashi is not for sale nya!
8.japanese: にゃ！？明石は非売品にゃ！
8.japaneseTL: Nya!? Akashi is not for sale nya!
8.english: Nya?! Akashi is not for sale, nya!

9.chinese: 指挥官，大家的装备有没有出问题喵，要不要换喵？
9.chineseTL: Commander, any problems with everyone's equipment nya? Need replacements nya?
9.japanese: 指揮官、みんなの装備に問題あるかにゃ？買い替えが必要かにゃ？？
9.japaneseTL: Commander, is there any problems with everyone's equipment nya? Do you need to buy replacements nya??
9.english: Commander, are there problems with anybody's equipment? Do you need replacements, nya?

1.chinese: 哼哼哼，平日里辛苦积攒就是为了这一刻喵！锵锵锵，融合了重樱和西洋元素的特别礼服！指挥官，今天要来点钻石喵？
1.chineseTL: Fufufu, I was working hard to stock up just for this moment nya! Jajajan~ A special dress that combines elements from both the Sakura Empire and the Occident! Commander, are you here to order some gems today nya?
1.japanese: ふっふっふー、普段溜め込んでいたのはこの時のため……にゃにゃ♪重桜と西洋要素を融合した特別なドレスにゃ！指揮官、今日もダイヤいかがかにゃ？
1.japaneseTL: Fufufu, I was saving up just for this moment... Nyanya♪ A special dress that combines elements from both the Sakura Empire and the Occident nya! Commander, how are your gems today nya?

2.chinese: 哼哼哼，平日里辛苦积攒就是为了这一刻喵！锵锵锵，融合了重樱和西洋元素的特别礼服！指挥官，今天要来点钻石喵？
2.chineseTL: Fufufu, I was working hard to stock up just for this moment nya! Jajajan~ A special dress that combines elements from both the Sakura Empire and the Occident! Commander, are you here to order some gems today nya?
2.japanese: ふっふっふー、普段溜め込んでいたのはこの時のため……にゃにゃ♪重桜と西洋要素を融合した特別なドレスにゃ！指揮官、今日もダイヤいかがかにゃ？
2.japaneseTL: Fufufu, I was saving up just for this moment... Nyanya♪ A special dress that combines elements from both the Sakura Empire and the Occident nya! Commander, how are your gems today nya?

3.japanese: 指揮官、いらっしゃいませにゃ～

4.chinese: 唔唔，不过…这套衣服的花费比预想的多，看来又得想些新的促销方法了喵…——喵？！指挥官？！欢、欢迎喵！
4.chineseTL: Hmmhmm, somehow... this outfit used up more than I originally though, seems like I have to think of a new way to market it nya... Nya?! Commander?! W-welcome nya!
4.japanese: にゃにゃ？これは…この衣装、予算オーバーにゃ！新しい販促を考えにゃいと…――にゃ！？指揮官にゃ？！い、いらっしゃいませにゃ！
4.japaneseTL: Nyanya? This is... This outfit is over budget nya! I need to think of a new way to market it nya... Nya!? Commander nya?! W-welcome nya!

5.chinese: 宴会有这么多人来，感觉在里面摆个摊说不定不错喵？！
5.chineseTL: There will be so many people coming to the party, feels like it might not be a bad idea to open a stand inside nya?!
5.japanese: パーティーには参加者が多いにゃ……売店の出張所を開くのもアリかにゃ！
5.japaneseTL: There will be so many people in the party nya... How about opening a branch here nya!

6.chinese: 既然是宴会这么特别的庆典，给指挥官打个折也不是不行喵~
6.chineseTL: Since it's a party for a special celebration day, it's not like I can't give a discount to Commander nya~
6.japanese: パーティーという祝いの日にゃんだから、指揮官にちょっとだけ割引しても大丈夫だにゃ♪
6.japaneseTL: Since it's a party for a special celebration day, it'll be fine to give Commander a little discount nya♪

7.chinese: 指挥官，要来点钻石喵？或者来点魔方喵？还是…两个都多来点喵？
7.chineseTL: Commander, are you ordering gems nya? How about cubes nya? Or... both nya?
7.japanese: 指揮官、ダイヤはいかがかにゃ？キューブもどうかにゃ？それとも…両方買うかにゃ？
7.japaneseTL: Commander, are you ordering gems nya? How about cubes nya? Or maybe... buy both nya?

8.chinese: 钻石是明石凭本事赚来的喵，只是给指挥官看看给指挥官动力喵！
8.chineseTL: Gems are earned by Akashi using her own abilities, I'm only showing Commander for some motivation nya~!
8.japanese: ダイヤは明石が頑張って稼いだにゃ！やる気を出させるために指揮官に見せただけだにゃ♪
8.japaneseTL: Gems are earned by Akashi's hard work nya! I'm only showing them to Commander for some motivation nya♪

9.chinese: 据说这也属于“杀必死”的范围喵？那一次50钻喵！
9.chineseTL: It seems like that's part of the "paid services" nya? That was 50 gems nya!
9.japanese: これも「有料サービス」のうちかにゃ？…一回50ダイヤにゃ！
9.japaneseTL: That was also "paid service" nya?... 50 gems for one time nya!

10.chinese: 在大家努力的时候，明石也做了很多宴会的准备喵~
10.chineseTL: While everyone was working hard, Akashi made many preparations for the party nya~
10.japanese: みんなが頑張っているうちに、明石もパーティーの準備をたくさんしたにゃ～
10.japaneseTL: While everyone was working hard, Akashi was also making many preparations for the party nya~

11.chinese: 指挥官，明石要膝枕喵！这种一般是反过来的？才不管喵，明石要在指挥官的大腿上睡觉喵！
11.chineseTL: Commander, Akashi wants a lap pillow nya! It's usually the other way? I don't care nya, Akashi is sleeping on Commander's thighs nya!
11.japanese: 指揮官、明石、膝枕をしてほしいにゃ！…逆にゃ？知らないにゃ！明石は指揮官の太ももで寝るにゃ！
11.japaneseTL: Commander, Akashi wants a lap pillow nya!... The opposite nya? I don't care nya! Akashi is sleeping on Commander's thighs nya!

1.chinese: 哦，指挥官你好喵。是来买明石的新刊的喵？今天可是祭典的日子喵～好好逛逛喵♪
1.chineseTL: Ah, hello Commander nya. Are you here to buy Akashi's new work nya? Today is the day of the festival nya~ Have fun nya♪
1.japanese: おっ、指揮官こんにちはにゃ。明石の新刊を買いに来たのかにゃ？今日はお祭りの日にゃから、思いっきり楽しんでにゃ♪
1.japaneseTL: Ah, hello Commander nya. Are you here to buy Akashi's new work nya? Today is the day of the festival, have fun nya♪
1.english: Ohh, it's Commander, nya. Have you come to buy Akashi's new work, nya? Today's a holiday, so go ahead and enjoy yourself, nya~

2.chinese: 哦，指挥官你好喵。是来买明石的新刊的喵？今天可是祭典的日子喵～好好逛逛喵♪
2.chineseTL: Ah, hello Commander nya. Are you here to buy Akashi's new work nya? Today is the day of the festival nya~ Have fun nya♪
2.japanese: おっ、指揮官こんにちはにゃ。明石の新刊を買いに来たのかにゃ？今日はお祭りの日にゃから、思いっきり楽しんでにゃ♪
2.japaneseTL: Ah, hello Commander nya. Are you here to buy Akashi's new work nya? Today is the day of the festival, have fun nya♪
2.english: Ohh, it's Commander, nya. Have you come to buy Akashi's new work, nya? Today's a holiday, so go ahead and enjoy yourself, nya~

3.chinese: 画画……啊，板子笔芯快要磨掉了喵。看来得让不知火订点新的了喵
3.chineseTL: Drawing drawing... Ah, the board pen is about to wear off nya. I'll have Shiranui order a new one nya.

4.chinese: 今天不是店员模式，而是作家模式喵。不收你钻石的喵
4.chineseTL: Today I'm not in shopseller mode, but artist mode nya. I won't take your gems nya.

5.chinese: 圣路易斯，貌似在做板娘喵！？呃呃呃……下次应该把她叫到明石这边喵？……不行喵，内容差的有点远喵……
5.chineseTL: St. Louis, looks like she could be a seller nya!? Eh... Should call her over to Akashi's side next time nya?... No good nya, the content might be a bit too much nya...

6.chinese: 喵？好像参加”网上同人展“就不用明石自己来看摊了喵？……好、好方便喵
6.chineseTL: Nya? If I participate in the "Online Doujin Convention", Akashi won't need to watch the booth by herself nya?... S-sounds convenient nya.

7.chinese: 喵！？这、这种事只许在本子里出现喵！
7.chineseTL: Nya!? T-that sort of stuff is only allowed to happen in the books nya!

8.chinese: 来邮件了喵！当选落选……好像不是这个邮件喵。喵……
8.chineseTL: There's mail nya! Lottery results... Seems like that's not the mail nya. Nya...

9.chinese: 今天还要卖本子所以很累了喵……签绘麻烦下次喵
9.chineseTL: I still have to sell books today so I'm tired nya... Art signing for next time please nya

10.chineseTL: N-no running on the sea nya!

4.chinese: 今天也有很多好东西～指挥官不要错过了喵！
4.chineseTL: There is lots of good stuff today~ Commander don't miss out nya~!
4.japanese: 今日もお得が一杯あるにゃ～逃したら後悔するにゃ～
4.japaneseTL: There are plenty of good deals today nya~ You'll regret it if you miss out nya~
4.english: Lots of good stuff today, Commander~! Don't miss out, *Nyaa~*!

5.chineseTL: Commander turned out to have so much free time nya~?
5.japanese: 指揮官そんなに暇なのかにゃ？
5.japaneseTL: Commander had so much free time nya~?

6.chinese: 明石可是很忙的喵，才没有空陪指挥官玩喵
6.chineseTL: Akashi is very busy nya~, there is no time to play with Commander nya~
6.japanese: 明石は忙しいにゃ。指揮官と遊ぶ暇がないにゃ～
6.japaneseTL: Akashi is busy nya~ There is no free time to play with Commander nya~
6.english: Akashi is busy, *Nyaa~*, and doesn't have time to play with Commander, *Nyaa~*...

7.chinese: 指挥官也想被明石“修理”一下吗？
7.chineseTL: Commander also wants to be "repaired" by Akashi?
7.japanese: 指揮官も明石に「修理」されたいかにゃ？
7.japaneseTL: Commander also wants to be "repaired" by Akashi nya~?
7.english: Do you want to be 'repaired' by Akashi, Commander?

8.chinese: 喵？！原来是指挥官…要买点什么喵？
8.chineseTL: Nya~?! It was Commander... want to buy something nya~?
8.japanese: にゃ？！指揮官にゃ…何か買うかにゃ？
8.japaneseTL: Nya?! It's Commander nya~... what do you want to buy nya~?
8.english: *Nyaa~*?! Commander... you want to buy something, *Nyaa~*?

9.chinese: 明石耳朵都要被你摸平了喵…
9.chineseTL: Akashi's ears are going to get flattened nya...
9.japanese: 明石のミミがベタんこにされそうだにゃ…
9.japaneseTL: Akashi's ears are going to get flattened nya...

10.chinese: 喵？指挥官又来看明石了？
10.chineseTL: Nya~? Commander came to see Akashi again?
10.japanese: にゃ？また明石を見に来たのかにゃ？
10.japaneseTL: Nya~? Came to see Akashi again nya~?
10.english: *Nyaa~?* Commander here to see Akashi again?

11.chinese: 多看看店里的商品明石会更高兴的喵
11.chineseTL: Akashi will be even happier if you came more often to look at the shop's products nya~
11.japanese: お店のものをもっと見たら、明石はもっと楽しいにゃ♪
11.japaneseTL: If you come more often to look at the shop's products, Akashi will be even happier nya~♪
11.english: It'd make Akashi happy if you took a look at something to buy... *Nyaa~*...

12.japanese: あ、明石はペットじゃないにゃ！

13.chinese: 如果乱碰到奇怪的设备，可是会受伤的喵！
13.chineseTL: If you carelessly touch any strange gear, you might get hurt nya~!
13.japanese: 変な設備に触ると怪我するにゃ。
13.japaneseTL: If you touch any strange gear, you will get hurt nya.
13.english: Watch out for weird gear, you might get hurt, *Nyaa~*!

14.chinese: 才、才没有觉得开心呢喵…
14.chineseTL: I-I didn't really get happy nya...
14.japanese: べ、別に嬉しくなんかないにゃ…
14.japaneseTL: I-I didn't really get happy nya...

15.chinese: 呼喵？指挥官又在摸鱼了喵？不想被举报的话就多买点东西喵！
15.chineseTL: Funya~? Commander is slacking off again nya~? If you don't want to get reported, better buy something nya~!
15.japanese: うにゃ？またサボりに来たかにゃ？上に報告されたくなかったら商品を見てみるにゃ～
15.japaneseTL: Funya~? Commander is slacking off again to come here nya~? If you don't want to get reported, better take a good look at the products nya~
15.english: *Purr*, *Nyaa~*? Commander, touching fish again, *Nyaa~*? Buy something or I'm going to report you, *Nyaa~*!

16.japanese: 明石、ちょっと眠いにゃ…
16.japaneseTL: Akashi, feeling a bit sleepy nya...

17.chineseTL: Is this... an intimate touch nya~?
17.japanese: これは…スキンシップにゃ？

18.chineseTL: Come see me more often nya~
18.english: Come and see me when you can, *Nyaa~*!

19.chinese: 指挥官状态怎么样，要不要明石给你检查下喵？
19.chineseTL: How is Commander's status, do you need to be inspected by Akashi nya~?
19.japanese: 指揮官、どうかにゃ？明石が検査してあげようかにゃ？
19.japaneseTL: Commander, what's up nya~? Want to get inspected by Akashi nya~?
19.english: Commander, what's up? Want Akashi to inspect you?

21.chinese: 就、就算这样也不会给你打折的喵！
21.chineseTL: E-Even like this I won't give you a discount nya~!
21.japanese: や、安くして上げないにゃ！
21.japaneseTL: I-I'm not giving you a discount nya~!
21.english: Well... it's not like you get a discount, *Nyaa~*!

22.chinese: 呼喵…哈！！太、太舒服了差点就被你蒙混过去了喵！
22.chineseTL: Funya... Haa!! I-It's so comfortable I almost let you get away with it nya~!
22.japanese: ふにゃあ…ハッ！！き、気持ちよすぎてついごまかされるところだったにゃ！
22.japaneseTL: Funya... Haa!! I-It was so comfortable I almost got deceived nya~!
22.english: *Nyaa...~* Ha!! So, so comfortable. You almost got away with it, *Nyaa~*!

23.chinese: 眼睛和脑袋都骨碌碌晕乎乎了喵…
23.chineseTL: Eyes and head are all dizzy nya~...
23.japanese: 目も頭もフラフラだにゃ…
23.japaneseTL: Eyes and head are all dizzy nya~...

24.chinese: 指挥官身上有股让人安心的味道喵…
24.chineseTL: Commander has a smell that makes you feel at ease nya...
24.japanese: 指揮官から安心する匂いがするにゃ……
24.japaneseTL: Commander has a smell that makes you feel at ease nya...

25.chineseTL: I like Commander the most nya~
25.japaneseTL: Commander, I love the most nya~
